content: निःसृ {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To come forth, slip away from, go out, issue from; बाणैः खरकार्मुकनिःसृतैः <ls>Rām.</ls>; <ls>Śi. 9. 25.</ls> {@--2@} To depart, set out for; <ls>Ms. 6. 4.</ls> {@--3@} To flow forth, ooze out, exude; यो हेमकुंभस्तनानिःसृतानां <ls>R. 2. 36.</ls> {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} To turn out, expel, drive away.
